# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
def main():
    s = input()
    print(s.replace('s', 'x')) 


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

def main():
    s = raw_input()

    print(s.replace('s', 'x').replace('S', 'X'))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
